title: Mount Arjevani
about: Mount Arjevani is located on the border of Gori and Tsalka municipalities, on the Trialeti ridge. Its height is 2759 meters. The mountain slopes are covered with alpine and subalpine meadows, and further down is a beech forest. Mount  Arjevani is one of the most attractive places for nature and hiking lovers. From here, unfold amazing, wide views, which make a great impression on the visitor. If you are a fan of adventure, mountains and alpine meadows, you will definitely enjoy an interesting and unforgettable hike on Mount Arjevani.
